price: E fizemos a terra emanando em fontes. Então, depararam-se as águas, conforme ordem determinada.
arabic: وَفَجَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ عُيُونٗا فَٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرٖ قَدۡ قُدِرَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wafajjarnā al-arḍa ʿuyūnan fal-taqā al-māu ʿalā amrin qad qudira
